newsitem.title: USA: Group seeks removal of two Purus directors.
newsitem.headline: Group seeks removal of two Purus directors.

text.p: A group of Swiss investors which hold a 26.34 percent stake in Purus Inc said Tuesday they are seeking a special shareholders meeting to remove two of three directors of the company.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its members issued demand letters requesting the meeting be held on November 20, two days before the scheduled Purus annual meeting this year.
Led by Peter Friedli, a Zurich investment adviser, the group said it is seeking through a stockholders protective committee the removal of Russell Burbank, chairman, and Michael Dettmers.
